page.title: 06MAYDAY IN CHURCH STRETTON
page.content: On the Saturday after May the first we celebrate May Day in the square. There are stalls that sell things like trays, books and pencil crayons. Some of the stalls are games. We have volunteers to be put in the stocks and people throw wet sponges at them. There is also a roundabout.That's fun! We have{May-pole dancing}and a{ {May Queen.}At school we girls make May crowns and the best one wins. That person is the{May Queen.} Our{May-Fair}attracts many people from the villages close by and brings extra trade and traffic to the town.
